# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please do not file public issues for security vulnerabilities.

Preferred: GitHub private vulnerability report

- [Open a private security advisory](https://github.com/westondunn/panic-at-the-syslog/security/advisories/new)

Fallback contact: open a GitHub Discussion and request secure contact routing.

Include:

- Description and impact
- Reproduction steps / PoC
- Affected versions/commit

## Supported Versions

We support the latest release and `main`.

## Privacy note

This project processes network logs. Avoid uploading real logs in public issues.
